Package gui.view

Class SideControlPane

java.lang.Object
gui.view.SideControlPane
public class SideControlPane
extends java.lang.Object
This class implements the side pane with the buttons to move around the matchfield and to choose the machine / farmer.
Author:
Judith

  • Field Summary

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void addToGridPane​(LSButton button, int column, int row)
    Adds the given button to the machinePane at the given column and row index.
    private void createControlButtons()
    Creates the buttons with those the player can move the machine / farmer around the matchfield as well as the button that can be clicked, when some action is possible to do.
    private void createMachinePane()
    Creates the grid pane, that holds the buttons to choose the machine / farmer to move around the field.
    private void fillMachinePaneWithButtons()
    Loads the images, initializes the image views and buttons and adds them with the help of the method addToGridPane() to the machinePane.

  • Constructor Details

    • SideControlPane

      protected SideControlPane​(boolean farmer, boolean tractor, boolean harvester, boolean cultivator, boolean dumpTruck, boolean seedDrill, GameController gameController)
      Construcs an object of the class SideControlPane. It immediately initializes the sidePane.
      Parameters:
      farmer - hands the boolean to the method initializeSidePane()
      tractor - hands the boolean to the method initializeSidePane()
      harvester - hands the boolean to the method initializeSidePane()
      cultivator - hands the boolean to the method initializeSidePane()
      dumpTruck - hands the boolean to the method initializeSidePane()
      seedDrill - hands the boolean to the method initializeSidePane()
      gameController - from the class game to make the buttons for moving around work

  • Method Details

    • initializeSidePane

      private void initializeSidePane​(boolean farmer, boolean tractor, boolean harvester, boolean cultivator, boolean dumpTruck, boolean seedDrill)
      Sets the size and layout of the pane and creates all the nodes with the help of the other methods of the class.
      Parameters:
      farmer - - hands the boolean to the method setButtonsDisabled()
      tractor - - hands the boolean to the method setButtonsDisabled()
      harvester - - hands the boolean to the method setButtonsDisabled()
      cultivator - - hands the boolean to the method setButtonsDisabled()
      dumpTruck - - hands the boolean to the method setButtonsDisabled()
      seedDrill - - hands the boolean to the method setButtonsDisabled()

    • createMachinePane

      private void createMachinePane()
      Creates the grid pane, that holds the buttons to choose the machine / farmer to move around the field.

    • fillMachinePaneWithButtons

      private void fillMachinePaneWithButtons()
      Loads the images, initializes the image views and buttons and adds them with the help of the method addToGridPane() to the machinePane.

    • addToGridPane

      private void addToGridPane​(LSButton button, int column, int row)
      Adds the given button to the machinePane at the given column and row index.
      Parameters:
      button - - button / node that is added to the machinePane
      column - - index of the column to which the node ist added
      row - - index of the row to which the node ist added

    • setButtonsDisabled

      public void setButtonsDisabled​(boolean farmer, boolean tractor, boolean harvester, boolean cultivator, boolean dumpTruck, boolean seedDrill)
      Sets the buttons of the machinePane disabled, depending on the parameters that are handed to this method. Machines / farmer, that are not in use should be disabled when walking around and able to click when choosing the next machine / farmer.
      Parameters:
      farmer - - sets the farmerButton disabled if true
      tractor - - sets the tractorButton disabled if true
      harvester - - sets the harvesterButton disabled if true
      cultivator - - sets the cultivatorButton disabled if true
      dumpTruck - - sets the dumpTruckButton disabled if true
      seedDrill - - sets the seedDrillButton disabled if true

    • createControlButtons

      private void createControlButtons()
      Creates the buttons with those the player can move the machine / farmer around the matchfield as well as the button that can be clicked, when some action is possible to do.

      Getter for the sidePane.
      Returns:
      - the requested sidePane
